title: _tomcc：PE中可以潜行了
author: ufof
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ufof 于 2015-7-23 18:25 编辑 
Okay, what do you think about these controls? The O button can be double-tapped to toggle crouching! 
_tomcc：你对这个控制按钮意见如何？双击O键可以切换潜行/站起。



People hating that a lot, it's not set in stone :) But what's so wrong with it?
_tomcc：有许多人开始反对，还好可以这个新功能可以取消 :) 不过有哪里不好了？

FINE I'LL LEAVE IT AS IT WAS :<
_tomcc：好吧我把他取消了:<

No actually, I'll put it back, playing with it does feel better guys :P Let's say that we'll put it in the beta, so you can try it out!
_tomcc：算了，我还是保留它吧，这真是一个很好的功能 :P 这个功能会在beta版中添加，你们就可以尝试了！





@TheYlissean：@_tomcc ever considered allowing for the buttons to be moved around? Like if I wanted to put the crouch button lower and smaller.

@_tomcc ：@TheYlissean yeah, we were planning to have that for 0.12 but it's a lot more complicated than it looks like :P
是否考虑支持来回移动按钮呢？比如如果我想把按钮调低和调小。
是的，我们在0.12有这个计划，但做这个比它看起来要复杂。
 来自@WuGuangYao2012

注：Notch说的事情与本新闻无关，所以划掉
